minecraftxiv.config.title: Minecraft XIV
minecraftxiv.config.scrollWheelZoom.name: Scroll wheel zoom
minecraftxiv.config.scrollWheelZoom.desc: Zoom with scroll wheel (overrides hotbar scrolling).
minecraftxiv.config.movementCameraRelati: Make movement work relative to the camera instead of the player.
minecraftxiv.config.lockOnTargeting.name: Lock-on targeting
minecraftxiv.config.lockOnTargeting.desc: Cycle through mobs with a keybind. Locked-on mobs override cursor targeting.
Toggles if this feature is allowed on the server.

Additional features that aren't vanilla server friendly.

minecraftxiv.config.targetFromCamera.des: Pick target from cursor position, bypassing player line of sight.
minecraftxiv.config.unlimitedReach.name: Unlimited reach
minecraftxiv.config.unlimitedReach.descr: Allow interaction with blocks no matter how far from the player they are.
